vNetRGName.value: <The name of the resource group containing the vNet and subnet>

vNetName.value: <The name of the vNet to use>

subnetName.value: <The name of a subnet within the specified vNet>

storageAccountName.value: <The name of the storage account to be used>

vmName.value: <The naming convension to use for the VM, excluding numbering>

imageOffer.value: <The name of the Azure Image Offer>

imageSku.value: <The name of the Azure Image Sku>

adminUserName.value: <The local administrator username for the VM>

adminPassword.value: <The local administrator password for the VM>

domainUsername.value: <Password of the account on the domain>

domainPassword.value: <Password of the account on the domain>

ouPath.value: <Specifies an organizational unit (OU) for the VM>
